summary.span: 使用 哈希函数计算基于哈希值的消息验证代码 (HMAC)。

span.span: Computes a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) by using the hash function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种构造从 ripemd-160 哈希函数并用作基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (hmac) 的加密哈希算法。 is a type of keyed hash algorithm that is constructed from the RIPEMD-160 hash function and used as a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC). HMAC 过程将与消息数据的机密密钥、 哈希结果与哈希函数，同样，与该密钥组合该哈希值，然后将哈希函数应用第二次。The HMAC process mixes a secret key with the message data, hashes the result with the hash function, mixes that hash value with the secret key again, and then applies the hash function a second time. 输出哈希值为 160 位长度。The output hash is 160 bits in length. HMAC 可以用于确定是否通过不安全通道发送的消息已被篡改，前提是发送方和接收方共享机密密钥。An HMAC can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 发件人计算原始数据的哈希值，并将原始数据和哈希值作为一条消息发送。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the hash value as a single message. 接收方将收到的消息哈希值重新计算，并检查计算的 HMAC 与传输的 HMAC 相匹配。The receiver recalculates the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed HMAC matches the transmitted HMAC. 对数据或哈希值的任何更改产生不匹配，因为更改消息和重新生成正确的哈希值需要的机密密钥。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始与计算所得的哈希值匹配，消息进行身份验证。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated. 接受任何大小的密钥，并生成长度为 160 位哈希序列。 accepts keys of any size, and produces a hash sequence that is 160 bits long. RIPEMD 哈希算法和其后续任务已由欧洲这个项目开发。The RIPEMD hash algorithm and its successors were developed by the European RIPE project. 原始 RIPEMD 算法旨在替换 MD4 和 MD5 和更高版本强化，重命名 ripemd-160。The original RIPEMD algorithm was designed to replace MD4 and MD5 and was later strengthened and renamed RIPEMD-160. Ripemd-160 哈希算法生成 160 位哈希值。The RIPEMD-160 hash algorithm produces a 160-bit hash value. 算法的设计器已将它放在公用域中。The algorithm's designers have placed it in the public domain. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用文件进行签名对象，然后如何验证该文件。The following example shows how to sign a file by using the object and then how to verify the file.
